content.rendered:
About us

Revive Printers specialises in speedy and cost effective printer repairs within the Perth metropolitan area.

Whether your photocopier is faulty or you’ve got a problematic printer, as one of Perth’s premier printer repair services, we’re the go to place to sort out your misbehaving machine.

Our friendly and knowledgeable technicians have a wealth of knowledge and experience of information and communication technologies. Whether you’re looking for a laser printer repair or require your fax machine servicing, we’re just a phone call away. We can also assist with multi-function printer servicing and repairs too.

Revive Printers service, repair and maintain most major brands including Hewlett Packard (HP), Brother, Lexmark and Kyocera to name just a few. We’re also proud to be an approved warranty repairer for OKI in Western Australia.

We can fix both commercial and domestic machines, including:

  • photocopiers
  • printers
  • facsimiles
  • multi-function printers (MFPs)
  • multi-function devices (MFDs)

 

Company Founder

Richard Jillings

Richard enjoys tinkering with his printers, playing with his dogs, and enjoying a nice cup of tea 🙂 He can make your printer nightmares magically disappear.
